attributes.action: Save Harrow rugby & other clubs from greedy councils
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Harrow council is hitting us with new excesive costs, which
     means they will shut us down. If they get away with this, other
     councils will follow. They are targeting all the sports clubs
     that saved up and built a clubhouse on their grounds, and then
     through some clause in the landlord/tenants act, they claim the
     right to charge a huge rent on the clubhouse. This puts so much
     finantial strain on the clubs, they are forced to close down.
     We need to club together to stop this, it is already too late
     for several bowling clubs in Harrow; it could be your clubs
     next!
